newsitem.title: USA: FORECAST-Inventory buildup,exports boost Q1 US GDP.
newsitem.headline: FORECAST-Inventory buildup,exports boost Q1 US GDP.

text.p: Inventory building and strong U.S. exports in March should lead to an upward revision in first-quarter Gross Domestic Product (GDP) when that figure is reported on Friday, economists said.

The government has reported that GDP expanded 5.6 percent in the first quarter. Economists polled by Reuters estimated, on average, that the revised figure to be released at 0830 EDT/1230 GMT on Friday will show first-quarter GDP at 6.0 percent with the price index up 2.7 percent and the implicit deflator up 2.3 percent, as previously reported.
